author: henning
msg: Rework all test cases to adhere to match the TestSuite() principle,
thus allowing easy addition of new test cases to each method.
Remove most try { } catch () { println } constructs, throwing
unexpected exceptions up to the test framework. This avoids masking of
Break up some of the bigger, multi test testcases into smaller tests

author: thorsten
msg: CForms dissallow id='submit' they are using now id='ok'. I extended the usecase-fw to trigger ok as well.
